CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 2, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "The Women, Bless 'Em... are pictured here with Congressman James Van Zandt, who is a favorite with veterans' groups. In the foreground are C. S. Whittaker, Beltzhoover mortician and Dr. J. Roy McNeal. At the table (clockwise) are Mrs. Viola Steward, Mrs. Martha Moore, Mrs. Elvinia Yarborough, Mrs. L. E. Lampkin, Mrs. Gertrude Stokes, Mrs. Wavid Thompkins, in background, Mrs. Jessie Hewlett, Mr. Van Zandt, and Mrs. Ruth Algrim. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: C. S. Whittaker and Dr. J. Roy McNeal in foreground, with Viola Steward, Martha Moore, Elvinia Yarborough, L. E. Lampkin, Gertrude Stokes, Wavid Thompkins, Jessie Hewlett, Congressman James Van Zandt, and Ruth Algrim gathered around table, at Republican banquet, Loendi Club
